Our snake (#2) is at (3,2) and our target is the apple at (3,3). Moving UP takes us directly to that apple. There are no obstacles or enemy collisions (the only enemy snake, #1, is at (4,3) which is not on our path). Grabbing this apple is safe and gains us points.
